resources.string:
Acer Liquid phones have a bug that sets the EXIF date and time to 2002–12–08 12:00:00

This service monitors the DCIM/Camera folder and alters the EXIF data for the files captured with default Camera application.

You can also fix existing files using "Fix existing photos" menu item.

See http://rtg.in.ua/app/acer-exif-fixup for more information.
